mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Condin, William
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Canandaigua, Ontario Co., NY [Canandaigua, Ontario County, New York]
Canandaigua, Ontario Co., NY [Canandaigua, Ontario County, New York]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Condin, William Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of left thigh. Bullet entered popliteal space one and one half inches above the flexure of the knee joint passing obliquely downwards and inwards to exit to middle of internal condyle of the femur. Location Wounded: In escaping from [Provost Guard?]. Date Wounded: 1864/11/07. Nature of Wound: Revolver bullet. Result: Duty.
